original_text: For if you will indeed obey this word, then there shall enter the gates of this house kings who sit on the throne of David, riding in chariots and on horses, they and their servants and their people.
korean_text: 너희가 참으로 이 말을 준행하면 다윗의 왕위에 앉을 왕들과 신하들과 백성이 병거와 말을 타고 이 집 문으로 들어오게 되리라

sentences.original_text: For if you will indeed obey this word,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 너희가 참으로 이 말씀을 순종한다면,

sentences.original_text: then there shall enter the gates of this house
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 이 집의 문으로 들어올 것인데,

sentences.original_text: kings who sit on the throne of David,
riding in chariots and on horses,
they and their servants and their people.
